backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, affected frontend files, components, and test IDs for build verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables defining light/dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps and renders the ValentinePage component.
frontend/src/components/ValentineActions: Yes/No buttons with hover/touch scaling effects and No‑interaction tracking.
frontend/src/components/ValentinePage.ts: Controls transition between the prompt and success screens.
Shows the Valentine question and manages No‑button interactions and hiding.
frontend/src/components/ValentineSuccess: Displays the success message, meme image, and personalized text for Naina.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder for backend query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom romantic color theme and gradients.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider, rendering App into the root element.
frontend/src/publishSlug.ts: Defines the publish slug and validates that it meets length and character requirements on module load.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, plugins, and extended styles for the project.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, architectural notes, and known deployment constraints.
